comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12552?focusedCommentId=17384081) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
This shouldn't be a problem once we start to ship bundled binaries from the java-jars build.

We may choose to use the old approach to release to maven with the workaround mentioned in the description (or using a non-bundled ORC build), or choose to deploy the prebuilt binaries.

Either way, I'm postponing it to the next release.
